name: Swishy Hoops Master
description:
Are you ready to shoot some balls and get swishy? Throw some balls from the sides of the streets or on court. Do 2 consecutive swish hoops to get your ball on fire and reveal some juicy Swish Coins! Use Swish Coins to buy tons of cool balls and epic objects like Skull and Fishbowl with special abilities and each with their own physics!

Features:
- 3 different modes: Street, Court and 3 Point
- Infinite levels!
- Fun voxel art graphics with a unique colorful street theme
- Swishy gameplay, shoot from the sides and forget about boards!
- Court mode lets you shoot at different distances and practice with a board.
- Collect Swish Coins!
- Unlock all 36 ball varieties and discover their abilities!
